thread.title: BRIEF-Granite Construction Reports Qtrly Share Of $0.81‍​

title: BRIEF-Granite Construction Reports Qtrly Share Of $0.81‍​
text: February 16, 2018 / 2:36 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Granite Construction Reports Qtrly Share Of $0.81‍​ Reuters Staff Feb 16 (Reuters) - Granite Construction Inc: * GRANITE CONSTRUCTION INC QTRLY ‍REVENUES $801.3 MILLION , UP 20.2 PERCENT YEAR-OVER YEAR​ * GRANITE CONSTRUCTION INC - QTRLY SHARE $0.81‍​ * GRANITE CONSTRUCTION INC - SEES HIGH-SINGLE TO LOW-DOUBLE DIGIT CONSOLIDATED REVENUE GROWTH IN 2018‍​ * GRANITE CONSTRUCTION INC SEES ‍2018 CONSOLIDATED EBITDA MARGIN OF 7.0% TO 8.0%​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2o4akKd ) Further company coverage:
